lead_paragraph: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic expects a tough contest against Stoke City on Saturday, but is confident his team's recent upturn in home form will allow them to prevail against Mark Hughes' men in the Premier League on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Bilic Confident West Ham Can Beat Resurgent Stoke
headline.main: Bilic Confident West Ham Can Beat Resurgent Stoke

snippet: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic expects a tough contest against Stoke City on Saturday, but is confident his team's recent upturn in home form will allow them to prevail against Mark Hughes' men in the Premier League on Saturday....
